name: testapi6
description: Test and auto export document to .md or .swagger file. Support many others tasks

scripts.test: npx nodemon --watch src --watch modules --ext .ts --exec 'node -r ts-node/register -r ./bin/tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js --expose-gc --harmony --inspect src/test.ts'
scripts.start: npx nodemon --watch src --watch modules --ext .ts --exec 'node -r ts-node/register -r ./bin/tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js --expose-gc --harmony src/index.ts test/examples/crawler.yaml'
scripts.dev: npx nodemon --watch src --watch modules --ext .ts --exec 'node -r ts-node/register -r ./bin/tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js --expose-gc --harmony --inspect src/index.ts test/examples/doc_sequence.yaml'
scripts.preview: npx nodemon --watch src --watch modules --ext .ts --exec 'node -r ts-node/register -r ./bin/tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js --expose-gc --harmony --inspect src/preview.ts test'
scripts.serve: npx nodemon --watch src --watch modules --ext .ts --exec 'node -r ts-node/register -r ./bin/tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js --expose-gc --harmony --inspect src/index.ts test/examples/mock_data.yaml'
scripts.watch: npx nodemon --watch src --watch modules --ext .ts --exec 'yarn build:only && yarn doc'
scripts.docker:pub: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -t doanthuanthanh88/testapi6 . --push && docker pull doanthuanthanh88/testapi6
